metadata.title: Hatman of Ireland Authentic Tweed Flat Cap 100% Irish Wool Handmade Ireland Men Casquette Navy Green Charcoal
features: AUTHENTIC IRISH CAP - Made in County Galway
100% IRISH WOOL - Guaranteed Irish Certified Product
WARM AND DURABLE - Tweed is world renowned for its warmth and durability. Luxurious Quilted Lining.
HEIRLOOM QUALITY - The flat cap has lasted the test of time, worn by generations these are unique and timelessness pieces
CHOOSE YOUR SIZE -Â Use the size chart image to find the best fit. When in doubt, we'd recommend a cap size larger.
description: Inspired by the vibrant colours of the Irish countryside, our Donegal tweed flat cap is carefully woven by our master weavers at our mills in County Galway, Ireland. Offering durability and a classic style, this cap is a comfort to wear and has been made timeless by generations of Irish farmers through the ages.
